form.identityInfo: FR-By law, we must verify your identity before we quote your insurance.
form.emailInfo: FR-This is the email we will send all insurance policy documentation to.
form.phoneNumberInfo: FR-A phone number is needed as an alternative contact method to email.

errors.phoneNumberMinLength: FR-Phone number must be 11 digits long.
